title: Staff of Accretion
content:
Staff of Accretion Rare 2~9 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning Accretion: The wearer gains Arcane Charge when they deal damage with close—quarter—range spell or cantrips. Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTopple Simmering in the heartwood of this staff, you sense a latent power pulsating — it seems the thing is impatient to build up and dispense its fierce energy. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 310

Staff of Accretion

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands
